scripts.dev:app: cd apps/file-brain && poetry run python -m file_brain.main --mode dev
scripts.start:app: cd apps/file-brain && poetry run python -m file_brain.main --mode prod
scripts.clean:containers: cd apps/file-brain/file_brain && TYPESENSE_DATA_DIR=$HOME/.local/share/file-brain/typesense-data docker compose rm -sf && echo '✅ Containers removed (project only)'
scripts.clean:images: cd apps/file-brain/file_brain && TYPESENSE_DATA_DIR=$HOME/.local/share/file-brain/typesense-data docker compose down --rmi local && echo '✅ Images removed (project only)'
scripts.clean:images-full: cd apps/file-brain/file_brain && TYPESENSE_DATA_DIR=$HOME/.local/share/file-brain/typesense-data docker compose down --rmi local && docker image prune -af && echo '✅ Images and dependencies removed (shows realistic pull progress)'
scripts.clean:docker: cd apps/file-brain/file_brain && TYPESENSE_DATA_DIR=$HOME/.local/share/file-brain/typesense-data docker compose down -v --rmi local && echo '✅ Docker cleaned: containers, volumes, and images removed (project only)'
scripts.clean:typesense: sudo rm -rf ~/.local/share/file-brain/typesense-data && echo '✅ Typesense data removed'
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:docker && npm run clean:db && npm run clean:typesense && echo '✅ Full cleanup complete - ready for fresh wizard test'
scripts.clean:all-full: npm run clean:images-full && npm run clean:db && npm run clean:typesense && echo '✅ Complete cleanup with dependencies - realistic wizard test'
scripts.db:revision: cd apps/file-brain && poetry run alembic revision --autogenerate -m
scripts.db:upgrade: cd apps/file-brain && poetry run alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:downgrade: cd apps/file-brain && poetry run alembic downgrade -1
scripts.db:history: cd apps/file-brain && poetry run alembic history
scripts.db:current: cd apps/file-brain && poetry run alembic current
